text: Yeah, I definitely get where you’re coming from. I think the eventual goal is to pack as much editing power as possible into the sidebar of the page editor, but because the forms app is so complex, there’s a ceiling to how much we can squeeze into the much smaller real estate of the page editor sidebar. The new beta gives you quite a bit more editing power from the sidebar than you had previously, so I’m hoping it’s a step in the right direction!

If anyone has any crazy ideas for some custom modules (either email or website page/landing page) my team is having a HubSpot CMS Hackathon next week and would love some code challenges from the community. The more complex the more exciting :wink: shoot me a DM

Just pitching some module idea excuses for you to try serverless functions :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye:
• A pricing quote calculator - where all of the logic is hidden in a serverless function
• A multiplayer drawing game(I did this this weekend - will share a link to anyone interested)
• A customer dashboard screen - could be for invoicing, could be an overview of their products, could be a tool to request work
• A module that makes it easy to create multi-step forms.
+1 for a module to easy create multi-step forms. :slightly_smiling_face:
